attributes.action: Stop the Gas and Electicity Rip Off
attributes.additional_details:
We are being ripped off by the utilities companies.
Every time consumers are hit with an increase in the name of "wholesale price increase" we see a big jump in reported profits from these companies.
This is extremly unfair on consumers and will lead to many families being unable to afford to heat or light their homes.
I want the Government to cap the profit margins made by these companies and bring Gas and Electricity back to affordable levels.
